props.name: Tag
props.description: is a tag assigned to the content control. One and the same tag can be assigned to several content controls so that you can make reference to them in your code.

props.name: Id
props.description: is a unique identifier of the content control. It can be used to search for a certain content control and make reference to it in your code.

props.name: Lock
props.description: is a value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not. 0 - only deleting, 1 - no deleting or editing, 2 - only editing, 3 - full access

props.name: InternalId
props.description: is internal id of content control. It used for all operation with content controls

ContentControlLock.name: ContentControlLock
ContentControlLock.description:
Is a value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not

0 - only deleting 1 - disable deleting or editing 2 - only editing 3 - full access

ContentControlType.name: ContentControlType
ContentControlType.description: Is a numeric value that specifies the content control type.

props.name: type
props.description: 1 - block content control 2 - inline content control 3 - row content control 4 - cell content control

ContentControlPropertiesAndContent.name: ContentControlPropertiesAndContent
ContentControlPropertiesAndContent.description: Is array of properties and contents of content controls.

props.name: Script
props.description: is must be a script that will be executed to generate the data within the content control.

props.name: Url
props.description: its must be a link to a shared file
